function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourists may engage in novelty-seeking behavior, leading to increased risk of contracting contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission and spread among tourists and local populations.","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of the risks associated with novelty-seeking behavior and emphasize the importance of adherence to infection prevention measures.","Technologies":"Public health messaging, educational campaigns, and communication technologies.","People":"Tourists, local populations, tourism industry stakeholders.","Owner":"Public health authorities, tourism organizations, and local communities."},{"Description":"Wildlife consumption by tourists may lead to the transmission of zoonotic diseases and global health epidemics.","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission, public health crises, and negative psychological effects.","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations and educational campaigns to discourage wildlife consumption, promote alternative food choices, and raise awareness of the risks associated with exotic food consumption.","Technologies":"Regulatory frameworks, public health messaging, educational materials, and communication technologies.","People":"Tourists, local populations, wildlife conservation organizations.","Owner":"Government agencies, wildlife conservation organizations, and tourism industry associations."},{"Description":"Public concern and criticism of wildlife consumption may lead to heated debates and social unrest, impacting tourism and local communities.","Impact":"Social tension, damage to the reputation of tourist destinations, and economic repercussions.","Mitigation":"Engage in transparent and open dialogue with the public, address concerns through effective communication, and collaborate with stakeholders to find sustainable solutions for wildlife conservation and alternative food options.","Technologies":"Social media platforms, community engagement tools, and communication technologies.","People":"Local communities, wildlife conservation organizations, tourism industry stakeholders.","Owner":"Local authorities, tourism industry associations, and wildlife conservation organizations."}]}
